writeups.title: ARM64 Buffer Overflow Exploitation
writeups.description: Deep dive into ARM64 architecture vulnerabilities, exploring stack-based buffer overflows and ROP chain construction in modern ARM64 systems.

writeups.title: IoT Device Hardware Analysis
writeups.description: Complete hardware teardown and security analysis of a popular IoT device. Covers firmware extraction, UART analysis, and discovering critical vulnerabilities.

writeups.title: HackTheBox: The Needle Writeup
writeups.description: Complete walkthrough of HackTheBox's 'The Needle' machine, featuring advanced Active Directory exploitation and privilege escalation techniques.

writeups.title: Modern Web Application Security Testing
writeups.description: Comprehensive guide to testing modern web applications for security vulnerabilities. Covers OWASP Top 10 and advanced injection techniques.

writeups.title: Android Malware Reverse Engineering
writeups.description: Step-by-step analysis of a sophisticated Android malware sample. Covers static and dynamic analysis techniques and understanding malicious behavior.

writeups.title: Social Engineering OSINT Investigation
writeups.description: Real-world case study of a comprehensive OSINT investigation for social engineering assessment. Advanced reconnaissance techniques demonstrated.

writeups.title: Machine Learning Model Poisoning Attack
writeups.description: Exploring adversarial attacks against machine learning models. Demonstrates data poisoning techniques and their impact on model behavior.

writeups.title: Advanced Binary Exploitation Techniques
writeups.description: Modern binary exploitation techniques including heap exploitation, format string vulnerabilities, and advanced ROP/JOP techniques.

writeups.title: Kubernetes Security Assessment
writeups.description: Comprehensive security assessment of Kubernetes clusters. Covers misconfigurations, privilege escalation, and container escape techniques.

writeups.title: Radio Frequency Analysis Techniques
writeups.description: Deep dive into RF analysis and exploitation. Covers SDR usage, signal analysis, and attacking wireless protocols in IoT devices.
